chinese: 他(过去)完成阅读这本书
他在一天内完成了阅读这本书
english: he finished reading the book in one day

chinese: 他在一个晚上内完成了阅读这，本书
english: he finished reading the book in one night

chinese: 在晚饭之后洗那些碗碟(ing形，式)
他在晚饭之后完成了洗碗
english: he finished washing the dishes after dinner

chinese: 他们在落日之前完成了刷墙
english: they finished painting the wall before sunset

chinese: 你完成了清理这个房子
你自己一个人完成了清理这个，房子
english: you finished cleaning the house by yourself

chinese: 用一个石头打破那个窗户
english: to  break  the  window  with  a stone

chinese: 用一个石头打破那个窗户(ing，形式)
english: breaking  the  window  with  a stone

chinese: 他们(过去)否认用一个石头打，破那个窗户
english: they   denied   breaking   the window with a stone.

chinese: 在最后一刻改变他的想法
english: to  change  his  mind  at  the  last minute

chinese: 在最后一刻改变他的想法(ing，形式)
english: changing  his  mind  at  the  last minute

chinese: 他(过去)否认在最后一刻改变，他的想法
english: he denied changing his mind at the last minute

chinese: 他(过去)否认向他的父母撒谎
english: he denied lying to his parents

chinese: 他(过去)否认假装是有病的
english: he denied pretending to be sick
to plan to escape from prison

chinese: 他们(过去)否认计划越狱
english: they denied planning to escape from prison
stealing  the  money  from  the bank

chinese: 他(过去)否认从银行偷钱
english: he  denied  stealing  the  money from the bank
he   was   accepted   by   the university

chinese: 那个他(过去)被大学录取了
english: that  he  was  accepted  by  the university

chinese: 他(过去)否认(那个)他(过去)被，大学录取了
english: he denied that he was accepted by the university
they  were  invited  by  the president

chinese: 他们(过去)否认(那个)他们(过，去)被总统邀请
english: they  denied  that  they  were invited by the president

chinese: 他们(过去)被一个有名的教授，所教
english: they  were  taught  by  a  famous professor

chinese: 他们(过去)否认(那个)他们(过，去)被一个有名的教授所教
english: they  denied  that  they  were taught by a famous professor

english: 1. 他们完成了打篮球。 2. 我（过去）否认忘记支付账单。 3. 他（过去）否认（那个）她（过去）是他的女朋友。
soundmark: /他（过去）否认（那个）她（过去）是他的女朋友。/

english: 1.They finished playing basketball. 2.I denied forgetting to pay the bill. 3.He denied that she was his girlfriend.
